headline: Uber CEO Says Gen Z Skipping Driving Licenses Is Real—And Personal. His Own Son Won't Get One, And It's Driving Him 'Crazy'
summary: Uber (NYSE:UBER) CEO Dara Khosrowshahi says the trend of Gen Z delaying or ditching driver's licenses isn't just something he sees in the data; it's happening in his own household. More Teens Are Ditching the Wheel "I'm still trying to get my son to get his driver's license," Khosrowshahi said on a recent episode of The Verge's “Decoder” podcast. "It drives me crazy. I don't know about you, but did you get a license the minute you could drive? It was just such a thing. It was a goal in life. It

headline: Weaponizing Tariffs: Top Stocks For The Summer Heat
summary: Tariff uncertainty fueling market volatility makes now a great time to consider fundamentally strong stocks that perform well during summer months. Learn more about 3 top stocks.
